text: For each protein tested , 40 l of a 50 % suspension of glutathione - agarose beads was centrifuged ( 500 g , 5 min ) , the supernatant removed and the beads washed sequentially with 200 l water and thrice with GST wash buffer ( 50 mM Tris pH 7 . 6 , 100 mM KCl , 5 mM MgCl 2 , 1 mM DTT ) . Following incubation with nsp1 [UNK] ( 6 g ) for 1 h at 4 • C on a rotating wheel , the protein was removed and the beads washed three times with GST wash buffer . Test protein ( 2 g ) was added to the beads and the incubation and washing steps repeated , with the GST wash buffer supplemented with 0 . 1 % NP - 40 . After removal of the final wash , 25 l 4 × Laemmli ' s sample buffer was added , the beads boiled for 5 min and supernatants analysed by SDS - PAGE .
